--- **Tender Announcement: Sandblaster (W0125-23WR05)** | **Section** | **Information** | | --- | --- | | **Reference Number** | WS3578884385-Doc3635116791 | | **Amendment Number** | 1 | | **Solicitation Number** | WS3578884385 | | **Publication Date** | 2022-09-12 | | **Tender Closing Date** | 2022-10-06T14:00:00 (EDT) | | **Region of Delivery** | Ontario (except National Capital Region) | | **Contracting Entity** | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) | | **Address** | 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada | | **End-User Entities** | Department of National Defence (DND) | | **End-User Address** | 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada | | **Contact Information** | Rojas Garcia, Osmany (SPAC/PSPC) - osmany.rojasgarcia@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca | | **Notice URL** | | | **Tender Description** | RFP – Sandblaster
Objective: Supply, deliver, and install a new blast cabinet and media recovery system at CESF / 86 Airfield Systems & Utilities (ASU).
Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Tendering Procedures: Competitive, Open Bidding. | --- **Background** The contractor is required to supply, deliver, and install a new blast cabinet and media recovery system at CESF / 86 Airfield Systems & Utilities (ASU), 8 Wing Trenton, 8 St Jean Ave, Bldg 291, Astra, ON K0K 3W0. The objective is to replace the current outdated and damaged blast cabinet. **Key Information** * All interested suppliers can submit a bid. * The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Ontario-based regulations. * Suppliers can submit documentation and bids in either official language of
